definition: To construct or establish something gradually, often referring to the development or creation of a physical structure, system, or organization. It is commonly used when describing the process of building or setting up something from the ground up, such as a building, a business, or a relationship.

examples.english: I want to build my house.

examples.german: Er hilft mir, mein Selbstvertrauen aufzubauen.
examples.english: He helps me build my self-confidence.

examples.german: Wir müssen eine neue Brücke aufbauen.
examples.english: We need to construct a new bridge.

examples.german: Sie versuchen, eine Beziehung zu ihm aufzubauen.
examples.english: They are trying to establish a relationship with him.

examples.german: Die Firma will ihre Präsenz auf dem Markt aufbauen.
examples.english: The company wants to build its presence in the market.
